original_text: And the ill favoured and leanfleshed kine did eat up the seven well favoured and fat kine. So Pharaoh awoke.
korean_text: 그 흉하고 파리한 소가 그 아름답고 살진 일곱 소를 먹은지라 바로가 곧 깨었다가

sentences.original_text: And the ill favoured and leanfleshed kine
did eat up the seven well favoured and fat kine
sentences.korean_translation: 일곱 마리의 잘 생기고 살찐 암소들을 모두 먹었다
